title: Machine Learning
text:
Python Interpreter [X]
Use an Anaconda environment

import torch 
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

print(torch.__version__)

X = torch.linspace(0, 10, steps=100)
Y = torch.sin(X)

plt.plot(X.numpy(), Y.numpy())
plt.show()

2.5.1









Did we see the thing?
false

import torch 
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

X = torch.linspace(0, 10, steps=100)
Y = torch.sin(X)

Z = X + Y

fig, ax = plt.subplots()

ax.plot(X.numpy(), Y.numpy())
